Interface gamecontroller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PacMan

    public interface gamecontroller
    Interface that controlls the Game. The KIoption class uses it to stop and resume the game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dostep()
      Calculates one game step
      void musicplay()
      Start music
      void musicstop()
      Stops music
      void pause()
      Pauses the game
      void resume()
      Resumes the game
      void setgamespeed(int speed)
      Sets game speed
